00015 class AsciiFileInitialiser
00016 {
00017     friend class AsciiFileWrapper;
00018 public:
00020     AsciiFileInitialiser(const std::string & file_name, const Size & precision)
00021             : file_name_(file_name_formatter(file_name))
00022             , precision_(precision) {}
00024     AsciiFileInitialiser(const AsciiFileInitialiser & afi)
00025             : file_name_(afi.file_name_)
00026             , precision_(afi.precision_) {}
00027 private:
00028     static std::string file_name_formatter(const std::string & file_name) {
00029         return std::string(file_name + ".txt");
00030     }
00031     const std::string file_name_; 
00032     const Size precision_; 
00033 };

00041 class AsciiFileWrapper
00042 {
00043     friend class OutputManager;
00044 protected:
00046     typedef AsciiFileInitialiser InitValue;
00047 
00049     AsciiFileWrapper(InitValue init_param) : init_param_(init_param) {}
00050 
00052     inline void open_file() {
00053         // one file per group
00054         file_.open(init_param_.file_name_.c_str());
00055         // initialise the file
00056         file_.clear();
00057         file_.fill(0);
00058         file_.precision(init_param_.precision_);
00059     }
00060 
00062     inline void close_file() {
00063         // close file
00064         file_.close();
00065     }
00066 
00067 public:
00069     void info_from_neuron_handler(const unsigned &) {}
00070 
00072     inline void write_to_file(const double & val) {
00073         file_ << val << "\t";
00074     }
00075 
00077     inline void write_to_file(const std::string & str) {
00078         file_ << str << "\t";
00079     }
00080 
00082 
00084     inline void insert_separation(const std::string &) {
00085         file_ << std::endl;
00086     }
00087 
00088 private:
00090     std::ofstream file_;
00092     const AsciiFileInitialiser init_param_;
00093 };
